Articles.Content:
I stumbled across the following theory (I will just post the relevant links, rather than copy-pasting everything to here):

[http://www.livescience.com/1398-early-earth-purple-study-suggests.html](http://www.livescience.com/1398-early-earth-purple-study-suggests.html)

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Purple_Earth_hypothesis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Purple_Earth_hypothesis)

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haloarchaea](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haloarchaea)

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Retinal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Retinal)

[http://www.space.com/3680-colorful-worlds-plants-planets-green.html](http://www.space.com/3680-colorful-worlds-plants-planets-green.html)
\*plays x-files music\* Kerbol System is Solar System confirmed.
Illuminati. Known it for a long time now. Glad someone discovered the truth.

> 
> Paintshop, I would imagine.

Being realistic isn't fun.
Boo realism. Unless it's ARMA. Then it's fine.

> 
> Boo realism. Unless it's ARMA. Then it's fine.

Exactly.

> 
> Exactly.

Also, this is an ARMA 3 review on Steam: CoD is for children, Battlefield is for boys and ARMA is for men. 

Sounds about right to me.

> 
> Also, this is an ARMA 3 review on Steam: CoD is for children, Battlefield is for boys and ARMA is for men. 
> Sounds about right to me.

I liek COD and BF4 \*crys\*

> 
> I liek COD and BF4 \*crys\*

I hope you're joking. If not, to each his own.

Surely it`s just a large amount of iodine in gas form?

![IodoAtomico.JPG](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/84/IodoAtomico.JPG)

> 
> Surely it`s just a large amount of iodine in gas form?
> [https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/84/IodoAtomico.JPG](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/84/IodoAtomico.JPG)

Lol, call it Iodive then.

Or maybe Eve as a whole is one gargantuan organism photosynthetysing by Retinal and with oceans of sweat because it's very hot? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
Eve just got hit with [The Corruption](http://terraria.gamepedia.com/The_Corruption) really hard, and nobody bothered to hit it with the Clentaminator before all life on the planet died.

> 
> eve just got hit with [the corruption](http://terraria.gamepedia.com/the_corruption) really hard, and nobody bothered to hit it with the clentaminator before all life on the planet died.

hahahahahahahahhahahhahahah auhhahahahahahahahahahahahahahha i get that reference
